text: Hey guys I am having an issue here I cannot find my crm card on my portal and when I am running hs project dev I get the following warning

Hi All, I'm wondering if someone could help me out.
I downloaded a theme from SteelThemes but I've had no reply.
I installed their Green Villa theme from the marketplace and I am trying to edit the Tabs Two module but the tabs title is missing when I edit it on the template.

<http://20107711.hs-sites.com/sales/the-old-works>

Would be very greatful if someone could help as the deveoper isnt replying

Hi all! :wave: :sparkler:
Is there a way to setup HubSpot CTA on the page, that if clicked opens up a modal with a form (on the same page, without page reload nor redirect)? I want also to be able to track all the stats like CTR etc. Unfortunately, HubSpot docs says CTA has <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ctas/calls-to-action-frequently-asked-questions#:~:text=Please%20note%3A%20when%20using%20an%20anchor%20ID%20in%20the%20URL%20of%20a%20CTA%2C%20the%20page%20will%20reload%20before%20scrolling%20to%20the%20anchor.%20This%20is%20because%20CTA%20click%20tracking%20requires%20the%20page%20to%20load%20and%20redirect.%20If%20you%20would%20rather%20the%20page%20not%20reload%2C%20use%20an%20anchor%20link%20instead.|to reload the page> and I should use anchor link instead, but it is not possible to use anchor link in CTAs... Is there a way to measure anchor links CTRs?
<@U06F64CJ5SB> Are you using a child theme of market place theme? If yes then you can clone that module in child theme and override the code from the cloned module
Hi Rushik, Thanks for your reply. It is a child module yes cloned from the original. I'm not sure what the problem is though why its not appearing

Hey guys, I want to integrate HubSpot in my webapp, the way it works is our clients can use our website to create forms and connect their HubSpot accounts. When customers fill out the forms the client's HubSpot should recieve the info - what is the best way to set this up?

I want the client to be able to click a button on our website and it should connect the HubSpot, not have them go to their HubSpot and generate a webhook and all that

Please give advice if possible. Need it rather quickly.
